name: Barry the buccaneer
description:
Thank you for playing Barry the Buccaneer.

use the arrows to move Mr. Barry across your ship

you see that bazooka cannon thing Barry is holding?

use space to shoot cannonballs out of that.

now you might be wondering "why would I need to shoot a cannon?", to answer your question if you did ask, there will be bad guys coming toward your ship, and they'll steal your treasure if they can enter your ship, so they must die.

Treasure is measured in points.

The enemies are :

Scary

slime - he dies in one hit, and is slow

raft child - this child made a raft just to steal your gold!

other than that, the child is just a slime but with a different sprite.

 armor guy - he has been sent to steal your gold by the king, kill him in two hits! he is also twice as fast as the previous two

 shark - the shark doesn't want your gold, doesn't even want you, kill him in two hits anyways! also pretty fast

 Hallucination - he isn't really there, but he'll damage you mentally if he gets near, so kill him. this is the strongest of them all! he may be slow, but he takes 4 hits to kill!
